PageTitle: display bgp ipv6 bfd session vpnv6 vpn-instance peer
FuncDef: The display bgp ipv6 bfd session vpnv6 vpn-instance peer command displays information about BFD sessions in vpn instances between BGP peers. The display bgp ipv6 bfd session vpnv6 vpn-instance peer command displays information about BFD sessions in vpn instances between BGP peers. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the BGP multi-instance name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without any spaces. The character string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").

Displays information about the BFD sessions of a VPNv6 instance.
-

Specifies the name of the VPN instance that has the IPv6 address family enabled.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters.

Specifies the IPv6 address of a peer.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp ipv6 bfd session vpnv6 vpn-instance vpn1 peer 2001:DB8:100::2
